table.name: vtiger_interviewprofiles
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_interviewprofiles` (`interviewprofilesid` int(11) NOT NULL, `interviewprofilesno` varchar(100) default NULL, `interviewprofiles_tks_profilen` varchar(250) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`interviewprofilesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_interviewprofilescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_interviewprofilescf` (`interviewprofilesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`interviewprofilesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_interviewprofiles_user_field
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_interviewprofiles_user_field` (`recordid` int(25) NOT NULL, `userid` int(25) NOT NULL, `starred` varchar(100) default NULL , KEY (`vtiger_interviewprofiles_user_field`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
